Sentencas: Having concurrent information regarding the state of health (SoH) of an operating solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack can actively improve its overall management.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Firstly, operating the SOFC by taking into account current health conditions, and its anticipated trend, can be beneficial to the total life span of the stack.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Furthermore, such information can be of great importance to the maintenance staff, e.g. unplanned shutdowns can be avoided.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Relatively little work has been done in the field of remaining useful life (RUL) prediction of SOFCs.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The majority of work employs stack/cell voltage as a direct link for RUL predictions.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: This paper proposes an integrated approach for SoH estimation based on stack's Ohmic area specific resistance (ASR).
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Subsequently, a drift model that describes the ASR increase over time enables accurate RUL prediction.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The approach consists of three steps.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Firstly, an Unscented Kalman filter, based on a lumped stack model, estimates the current ASR value.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Secondly, a drift model for describing the temporal evolution in ASR is recursively identified employing the linear Kalman filter.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Finally, employing the identified drift model, Monte Carlo simulation is performed to predict future time evolution in ASR and so to obtain RUL.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The developed approach is validated with experimental data from a 10 kW SOFC power system.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The results confirm that ASR is a viable SoH indicator for the SOFC stack.
Titulo: State of health estimation and remaining useful life prediction of solid oxide fuel cell stack
